excerpt.rendered:
A Macallan 14 Year old Moon Import at Cask Strength of 59% abv. This is matured in sherry wood and made for the inaugural Half Moon Series circa 1982. As this bottle is aged for 14 years it contains liquids in the 1960s. Gold.

Bottle size : 700ml
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 14
Vintage : 
ABV : 59%
